comments.body: Looks like we don't need to change this test as we don't remove `copyAndReset`
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -98,18 +98,19 @@ class AccumulatorV2Suite extends SparkFunSuite {
 
     acc.add(new java.lang.Double(1.0))
 
-    val acc2 = acc.copyAndReset()
-    assert(acc2.value.isEmpty)
-    assert(acc2.isZero)
+    val acc2 = acc.copy()

comments.body: we should also create a test for `copy` and `reset`
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -98,18 +98,19 @@ class AccumulatorV2Suite extends SparkFunSuite {

-    val acc2 = acc.copyAndReset()
-    assert(acc2.value.isEmpty)
-    assert(acc2.isZero)
+    val acc2 = acc.copy()
